> I am Assistant Professor (Profesor Ayudante Doctor) at Universidad Pública de Navarra. I have previously held research position at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. My research focuses on macroeconometric issues, particularly applied time series econometrics, analysis and forecasts of macroeconomic variables and effects of oil price shocks on macroeconomic variables.
